mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT q.*, rownum rn FROM (SELECT qa_tb.*, user_id "user_id.user_id" FROM qa_tb order by qa_date desc) q ) WHERE rn BETWEEN START_ROW(#{pageNum}, #{amount}) AND END_ROW(#{pageNum}, #{amount})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_TB(QA_NUM, QA_TITLE, QA_CONTENT, QA_DATE, USER_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(qa_num),0)+1 FROM qa_tb), #{qa_title}, #{qa_content}, SYSDATE,#{user_id.user_id})
mapper.update: update qa_tb set qa_title=#{qa_title}, qa_content=#{qa_content} WHERE QA_NUM=#{qa_num} and user_id = #{user_id.user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qa_tb WHERE qa_num=#{qa_num} AND user_id = #{user_id.user_id}
